column2: "I'll level with ya. If it was just a few Darkers, I wouldn't be havin' any trouble."
"But when there's so many of them comin' at me all at once, it gets kinda hard to deal, you know?"
"You're my best shot at revenge! Go take out all those guys who got in my way!"
"OK, off ya go! I'll be watchin' real close from up here!"
